mapper.select: SELECT sys_user.user_id,sys_user.username, (case WHEN person.user_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as isAttend from sys_user LEFT JOIN (SELECT ren_kbi_person.* from ren_kbi_person where ren_kbi_person.year = '${year}' and ren_kbi_person.month = '${month}') person on person.user_id = sys_user.user_id where sys_user.status = 1 ORDER BY sys_user.user_id
